root.name: System Protocol One
root.description: OverviewPlayer is controlling a futuristic network administrator in this indie game. Which takes heavy inspiration from Tron.Main objective is to fend of hackers and their virus attacks by building walls and towers.Main Features:More than 20 different levelsRetro-like graphics ala TronCatcty chiptune soundtrack30 Steam achievementsLeaderboardPC System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000 or laterProcessor: 2 GHz or higherMemory: 1 GB or higherGraphics: Resolution at least 1024x768, GeForce 8600 class or higher, or comparableDirectXÂ®: 9.0 or higherHard Drive: 200 MB
